locality: Madagascar. Prov. Toamasina. East of Antananarivo, c. 22 km NE of Moramanga. Ambatovy.
Moramanga, Ambatovy, Andasibe, Menalamba, Analamay. Without cuirasse. Samples preserved in alcohol. Collected with H. Razanatsoa, C. Rakotovao & Felix.

Permanent Plot (MBG), Special Reserve of Ambohitantely, Firaisana & Fivondronana Ankazobe. Mid-altitude rainforest. Plant preserved in alcohol and collected with R. Randrianaivo, J. Rakotoarimanana & J. Rabenantoandro.
Near Ranomafano National Park, roadside of RN45 ca. 9-10 km W of park office towards RN7. 3.5-4.0 km SW of intersection of RN25 & RN45 and Vorondolo
